useCase: Detecting localized manipulations, AI inpainting, and inconsistent compression regions
mechanism: Re-compresses the image at a fixed JPEG quality level and computes the absolute difference between the original and re-compressed version. Manipulated or AI-generated regions show distinct error level patterns compared to authentic content.
accuracy: High - 88-94% for JPEG images with detectable compression history
name: Error Level Analysis (ELA)
source: Krawetz, N. (2007) - A Picture's Worth: Digital Image Analysis and Forensics
parameters: Quality level: 95, Color space: YCbCr, Block size: 8x8 DCT, Threshold: adaptive
description: Resaves image at known JPEG quality and compares error levels. AI-generated images show uniform error patterns, while authentic photos exhibit variable compression artifacts.
